job.title: Software Engineer, Growth
job.description:
About Ninja

At Ninja, we are building delivery-only convenience stores that deliver in 10 minutes or less. It's a service that feels like magic. We are a rapidly growing startup building an exceptional team. Come be a part of our early journey in becoming a household name in last mile delivery across North America and the world.

We are venture-backed by the same investors of iconic companies like DoorDash.

Overview

As one of the first members of the Engineering team, you will need to be a generalist that can contribute at every part of the stack, not only in engineering, but across the whole company. You need to be a product-focused engineer that is highly analytical, and can pull insights from our data to shape our product.

Your responsibilities
  • Setup A/B tests to improve different funnels for increased retention, order growth, and increased basket sizes
  • Come up with hypotheses on our user behaviours, and write code to pull insights out of our data to answer these hypotheses
  • Work with our customer facing engineering teams to come up with new features and strategies to reduce our CAC and increase LTV
Requirements
  • You have experience working on growth at a high growth startup
  • Strong SQL skills
  • You have strong software engineering fundamentals with a passion for high quality code
  • You understand how to make tradeoffs that lead to the biggest business impact with the limited time that you have
Benefits
  • Work directly with the founder to shape the direction of our service and product
  • Steep learning curve and career growth trajectory. We're growing at breakneck speeds and we want a team that grows with us!
  • An opportunity to help build a potentially iconic company in its early days
  • Equity in a fast growing, early stage startup
